commit message: Fix random 'java.lang.IllegalStateException: Content view not yet created' in adding pulltorefresh view in onActivityCreated method.
Fix Caused by: android.util.AndroidRuntimeException: requestFeature() must be called before adding content.

Log httpUrl from getInputStream().
Add duration time to get the stream and parse it for the stations details.
Add details in the list tab, #20.
Add the stations number in the data status in the settings, closes #21.
Display pullToRefresh loader only when there are selectable stations.
Add pullToRefresh in the list tab and cancel asynctTask on a tab change, #20.

Force usage of pullToRefresh when first visible position is 0.
Load the almost visible row above the first visible.
Issue #19.
Update various versions from maven support, #18.

Remove commons-collections dependency (500kb for one method...).
Some cleanup...
Add buttons bar in view and new icons, #24.
Change default center geopoint to the gare lille flandres station and update default zoom level at 16, closes #23.
Handle the click on button to localize the station on the map, #24.
Handle the click on button to open the google maps apps available to make an itinerary, #24.

Fix #25. Still some issues when zoom <= 15 and there are a lot of stations near each others. It's due to the fact that that the default overlay is the detailled one and is bigger.
Update to osmdroid 3.0.10.
Rename VlilleMap view to MapView.
Fix #25, refresh stations in the onCreateView method.
Add marginBottom to the item details row, #30.
Change the refresh action bar icon, #30.
Revert minSdkVersion to 7 (Eclair) and update menu icons and activity bar icon for android 7, relative to #30.
Replace station_pin and station_pin stars by bigger icons, #30.
Add state pressed on buttons bar, #30.
Add control to not reload stations if there was nothing in the search field.

Redesign icon the station details for the map view, #30.
Use a black text on the red background when the station is empty.
Fix #36, add station details in the bubble window.
Rename icons according to the google convention, closes #30.
Fix #37, overlays disappeared when no network.
Change to be backward compatible with old db management.
Add droidparts reference in README, relative to #33.
Remove commons-collections dependency, for good. Relative to #29.
Release working with proguard: remove logs, shrink app... closes #29.
Fix #40, change the circle location color, relative to redesign #30.
Fix #39, the slider text for the setting 'stations around me' was unreadable.
Fix #44, progress indicator not visible on android 2.1.
